name: Pastel Skies
description:
Dodge clouds and aim for a high-score! 

Pastel Skies is a kawaii, hand drawn, endless, arcade style game that takes place in the pastel dreams of a cute, white cat.

Features

A cute, hand drawn art style

An original theme performed on an acoustic ukulele

Addicting and endless gameplay!

Tips

Press D on the title screen to delete your high-score

You can use WASD or the arrow keys to play

The game gets faster the longer you survive!

The Art, Music, SFX, Design, and Programming for this game was done entirely by me, Kububbis!
